Reset.Title: Reset settings to default
Reset.Label: Reset Pathmuncher Settings
Reset.Hint: This will reset all of the module's settings back to their defaults.

RestrictToTrusted.Name: Restrict Import to trusted users?
RestrictToTrusted.Hint: Only trusted users will be able to import

AddVisionFeats.Name: Add vision feats?
AddVisionFeats.Hint: If selected, Darkvision and Low-Light Vision will be added as feats to character sheet. Doesn't effect sense values.

LogLevel.Name: Log Level
LogLevel.Hint: The level of logs to place into the console.

UseCustomCompendiumMappings.Title: Use custom compendium mappings?
UseCustomCompendiumMappings.Label: Custom Compendium Mappings
UseCustomCompendiumMappings.Hint: This is useful for things like Battlezoo or Cleric+ modules, or even if you have your own compendium of custom feats.

ResetSettings.Title: Pathmuncher | Reset Settings
ResetSettings.Content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the Pathmuncher module settings' to their defaults?

PathmuncherImporter.Title: Pathmuncher | Import a character from Pathbuilder
PathmuncherImporter.StepOne: Step 1: Export your character using "Export JSON" from Pathbuilder via the burger menu
PathmuncherImporter.StepTwo: Step 2: Enter the 6 digit user ID number from the pathbuilder export dialog below

Ask.Name: Name?
Ask.Formulas: Formulas? (e.g. Formulas for an Alchemist book)
Ask.Choices: When munching features with choices, present choice dialogue in Foundry. If unchecked Pathmuncher will do it's best to guess the right choice. If it's unable to determine an option it will still prompt you for a choice. You almost certainly want this ticked.

PathmuncherImporter.PathBuilderJSON: Paste your Pathbuilder JSON data here

Pathmuncher.FetchFailed: Unable to fetch a character with Pathbuilder id {pathbuilderId}!
Pathmuncher.MissingItemsOpen: The following items could not be added. They may have already been added in a previous import or cannot be matched to a foundry item. You may be able to find them with a manual search.

Notifications.CreateActorPermission: Pathmuncher requires the CREATE ACTOR permission for your user.
